snippet: The Republican presidential candidate’s quick-tempered side was showing in an appearance on the “Today” show on Wednesday.
abstract: Sen Paul Rand of Kentucky has allowed a more quick-tempered side of his personality to come through during some of his first news interviews following announcement he will seek Republican presidential nomination; journalists have seen the more irascible version of Rand before, most often when he has been confronted about shifts in his political views or about statements he has made that have brought him widespread negative attention.
lead_paragraph: The Republican presidential candidate’s quick-tempered side was showing in an appearance on the “Today” show on Wednesday.

headline.main: Rand Paul Gets the TV Spotlight and Turns It on Interviewers in Testy Encounters
headline.print_headline: Paul Gets the TV Spotlight and Turns It on Interviewers in Testy Encounters
